name: Reinforced
effect: The Veteran gains +1 Structure and +1 Stress.

name: Veterancy
effect: The Veteran gains +1 Accuracy on all checks and saves for one mech skill (chosen at creation): Hull, Agility, Systems, or Engineering.

name: Limitless
effect: The Veteran can Overcharge. Instead of the standard cost, they always gain 1d6 heat.

name: Veteran Traits
effect: The Veteran gains either a General Veteran Trait or the Class Veteran Trait corresponding to their NPC class.

name: Feign Death [General]
effect: The first time that the Veteran is destroyed each combat, they are actually feigning death - they appear to be destroyed, but have 1 HP. Characters adjacent to the Veteran can reveal this with a successful Systems check or pilot skill check; otherwise, the Veteran remains unnoticed until they move or take action.

name: Lesser Sight [General]
effect: The Veteran ignores Invisible for characters within Range 3, and hostile characters in Range 3 canâ€™t Hide (though they remain Hidden if they were already).

name: Lightning Reflexes [General]
effect: Whenever the Veteran is attacked using any Heavy or Superheavy weapon, first roll 1d6. On 5+, the attack automatically misses. This effect does not stack with Invisible.

name: Parting Gift [General]
effect: The Veteran can Self-Destruct (see Lancer p.72).

name: Self Repair [General]
effect: 1/scene, the Veteran regains all HP and clears all conditions that weren't caused by their own systems, etc.

name: Air Superiority [Ace]
effect: 1/round, when the Ace hits a hostile character with a ranged attack, that character must pass an Agility save or immediately land if flying (this counts as falling without any damage), and additionally become unable to fly until the end of their next turn.

name: Mobile Emitter [Aegis]
effect: The Aegis is Slowed while Defense Net is active instead of Immobilized.

name: Rock and Roll [Archer]
effect: If the Archer chooses not to move during their turn, Suppress can be used against two targets instead of one and Moving Target may be used 2/round. Each target triggers and resolves Moving Target separately, and a target damaging the Archer only ends the effect of Suppress on that target.

name: Commando [Assualt]
effect: The Assault may move 2 spaces before or after attacking with the Combat Knife. This movement ignores engagement and doesn't provoke reactions. The Combat Knife gains Thrown 5, and when thrown automatically returns to the Assault at the end of their turn.

name: Whirling Death [Assassin]
effect: Whenever the Assassin reduces a hostile mech to 0 HP (causing structure damage or destroying them), they may immediately choose a new target for Assassin's Mark.

name: Remote Assemblers [Barricade]
effect: When the Barricade uses Mobile Printer, it can print cubes out to Range 10.

name: Close Protection [Bastion]
effect: Characters being protected by Friendly Interdiction may use the Bastion's Armor instead of their own whenever they take damage.

name: Rending Cleave [Berserker]
effect: On hit with the Chain Axe, the Berserker deals 2/3/4 kinetic damage to a different character adjacent to either the target or the Berserker.

name: Danger Close [Bombard]
effect: When the Bombard makes an attack with the Bombard Cannon, they may exclude one character of their choice in the area from the attack.

name: Leadwall [Breacher]
effect: Whenever the Breacher misses all attacks with the Dual Shotguns, it may make one additional attack for free.

name: Crashing Charge [Cataphract]
effect: The Cataphract may push characters affected by Trample 1 space in any direction.

name: Heavy Tread [Demolisher]
effect: All other characters treat a Burst 3 area around the Demolisher as difficult terrain.

name: Turret Nest [Engineer]
effect: All Deployable Turrets within Range 3 of the Engineer gain soft cover. While the Engineer is within Range 3 of four or more turrets, they also gain soft cover.

name: Oppresive Force [Goliath]
effect: When the Goliath uses Crush Targeting, they may affect every hostile character within Sensors. If they do, affected characters only take +1 Difficulty to attacks instead of +3.

name: Oppresive Force [Hive]
effect: 1/round, on a critical hit with the Hunter-Killer Nexus, the target must pass a Systems save or become Shredded until the end of their next turn.

name: Acrobat [Hornet]
effect: Any time an attack misses the Hornet, they may move up to 2 spaces in any direction as a reaction.

name: Spec Ops [Operator]
effect: The Operator is equipped with an NHP co-pilot and gains the AI tag. Their mech is autonomous and can even function without a pilot. This NHP ignores cascade and grants the Operator Immunity to Impaired. The Operator's pilot can also Dismount. While on foot, the pilot uses the Human class and can take all actions available to PC pilots, including Jockey. When the Operator is destroyed, the pilot can immediately Eject before Self-Erasure (bringing the NHP with them).

name: Power Rerouting [Priest]
effect: Characters linked to the Priest with Investiture can Overcharge. Instead of the usual cost, the Priest takes 1d6 heat.

name: White Hot [Pyro]
effect: The Flamethrower does +2 heat on hit.

name: Concussion Warheads [Rainmaker]
effect: 1/round, when the Rainmaker consumes Lock On as part of a successful attack with the Missile Pods, they may knock the target Prone.

name: Angled Deflection [Ronin]
effect: When the Ronin uses Rebound, on a roll of 4+ they may choose to have the attacker repeat the attack against themselves or against another hostile character within Range 3 of the attacker.

name: Thermal Dissipation [Scourer]
effect: Whenever Cooling Module activates, the Scourer creates a Burst 2 area of soft cover around themselves that lasts until the start of their next turn.

name: Tactical Reposition [Scout]
effect: When the Scout uses Cloaking Field, up to two allied characters within the affected area may immediately move their Speed to any other free spaces within the affected area. This movement ignores engagement and does not provoke reactions.

name: Mag Mines [Seeder]
effect: Whenever one of the Seeder's mines is detonated by a hostile character, they may move all of their other deployed mines up to 2 spaces towards the hostile character nearest to them; if two or more hostile characters are equally close to a mine, the Seeder chooses one. All mines must end this movement in free spaces.

name: Eye of the Storm [Sentinel]
effect: When Eye of Midnight is active, the Sentinel may attack with both the Combat Shotgun and Retractable Sword each time it takes the Overwatch reaction.

name: Blinding Laser [Sniper]
effect: Whenever a character gains the Sniper's Mark, they must pass a Systems save or become Impaired and Slowed until the end of their next turn.

name: Silent Stalker [Specter]
effect: The Specter can become Hidden while Engaged, and while Hidden can move through (but not stop in) spaces occupied by hostile characters.

name: Whitewash Coordinator [Support]
effect: When the Support uses Sealant Gun on an allied character, it does not cause them to become Slowed. When used on a hostile character, the target is also knocked Prone if they fail the Agility save.

name: Enfeeble [Witch]
effect: When the Witch uses the Invade Quick Tech action, on hit the target is also Slowed until the end of their next turn.
